data_quality.source: Extendicare Inc. 2024 Annual Financial Statements and MD&A
data_quality.validation_notes: Note: Extendicare is a SENIOR CARE PROVIDER, not a REIT. FFO/AFFO are company-specific non-GAAP measures used for senior care operations, NOT REALPAC REIT metrics. No investment properties, no traditional NOI. Amounts in thousands of CAD.

dilution_detail.reconciliation_note: Dilution from convertible debentures (redeemed in 2024 - dilution calculated from average outstanding during year). Basic: 84,218k, Diluted: 95,362k per Table 31 page 28.
dilution_detail.disclosure_source: MD&A page 28, Table 31 - Weighted Average Number of Shares

income_statement.note: Extendicare is a senior care company - no traditional REIT NOI. 'Earnings before depreciation, amortization, and other' = $144,549k (closest equivalent to EBITDA). Interest expense = Net finance costs $15,735k + interest component estimated at ~$20M based on debt levels.

ffo_affo.note: Extendicare FFO/AFFO are company-specific non-GAAP measures for senior care operations, NOT REALPAC REIT metrics. FFO = Net earnings + depreciation/amortization + deferred taxes + fair value adjustments + other adjustments - maintenance capex for FFEC. AFFO = FFO + non-cash items - additional maintenance capex. See MD&A Table 31 page 28.

portfolio.note: Extendicare operates senior care facilities (nursing homes, retirement homes, home care), not investment properties. Portfolio metrics not applicable for REIT schema.

other_adjustments.label: other_3
other_adjustments.description: Loss on early redemption of convertible debentures

other_adjustments.label: other_5
other_adjustments.description: Current income tax recovery on other expense and fair value adjustments

other_adjustments.label: other_10
other_adjustments.description: Principal portion of government capital funding

ffo_affo_components.reserve_methodology: Extendicare uses 'depreciation for FFEC (maintenance capex)' as a reserve estimate, then adjusts for 'additional maintenance capex' to reflect actual spending
ffo_affo_components.note: Extendicare FFO/AFFO calculation differs significantly from REALPAC REIT methodology. Starting point is Net Earnings $75,209k. FFO = $95,315k (Year 2024). AFFO = $92,805k (Year 2024). Reconciliation: Net Earnings + Depreciation/Amortization - Depreciation for FFEC - Depreciation for office leases + Other adjustments + Deferred taxes + JV adjustments = FFO. Then FFO + non-cash items - additional maintenance capex = AFFO.

acfo_components.reserve_methodology_acfo: N/A - senior care company, not REIT
missing_adjustments_acfo: Most ACFO adjustments not applicable for senior care company
acfo_components.note: Extendicare is not a REIT. CFO = $143,639k from cash flow statement (Page 60, Table 67). Development capex = Purchase of property, equipment and intangible assets = $41,950k. JV distributions = $2,432k. Most ACFO adjustments not applicable for senior care operations.

cash_flow_investing.note: From Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows, Page 60, Table 67. Purchase of property, equipment and intangible assets = $(41,950)k. Proceeds from sale of assets to joint venture = $20,482k. Proceeds from sale of Class C LTC assets = $8,990k. Investment in JV = $(718)k. Distributions from JV = $2,432k. Other investing inflows include proceeds from sale of Class C LTC assets + change in other assets.

cash_flow_financing.note: From Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows, Page 60, Table 67. Issuance of long-term debt = $130,000k. Repayment of long-term debt and lease liabilities = $(18,936)k. Dividends paid = $(40,020)k. Redemption of convertible debentures = $(125,680)k. Payment of lease liabilities related to purchase of LTC assets from lessor = $(29,918)k. Financing costs = $(3,331)k. Change in restricted cash = $19k. Other financing outflows = $(125,680)k debenture redemption + $(29,918)k lease payments = $(155,598)k.

liquidity.data_source: Balance sheet (Page 56, Table 62). Cash and cash equivalents = $121,846k. Restricted cash = $710k. Available cash = $121,846k - $710k = $121,136k. Credit facilities not disclosed in extracted sections - unable to determine undrawn capacity.

validation.notes: Balance sheet balances: Total assets $719,788k = Total liabilities $595,436k + Shareholders' equity $124,352k. NOI not applicable for senior care company. Revenue $1,466,202k. EBITDA equivalent (Earnings before depreciation, amortization, and other) = $144,549k = 9.9% margin, which is reasonable for senior care operations.
